name: asm-dom
description: A virtual dom in web assembly

scripts.compile: npm run clean && mkdir -p compiled && npm run compile:cpp && npm run compile:asmjs && npm run compile:wasm
scripts.compile:cpp: emcc -O3 -Wall -Werror --bind src/app.cpp -o compiled/asm-dom.bc && emcc -O3 -Wall -Werror --bind src/app.cpp -o compiled/asm-dom.o
scripts.compile:asmjs: mkdir -p compiled/asmjs && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --closure 1 --pre-js src/helpers/prefix.js --post-js src/helpers/postfix.js -s "EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['Pointer_stringify']" -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ELIMINATE_DUPLICATE_FUNCTIONS=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 compiled/asm-dom.bc -o compiled/asmjs/asm-dom.asm.js
scripts.compile:wasm: mkdir -p compiled/wasm && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --pre-js src/helpers/prefix.js --post-js src/helpers/postfix.js -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s "EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['Pointer_stringify']" -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ELIMINATE_DUPLICATE_FUNCTIONS=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 -s BINARYEN=1 -s "BINARYEN_TRAP_MODE='allow'" compiled/asm-dom.bc -o compiled/wasm/asm-dom.js
scripts.check:src: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib --ignore src/helpers
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --ignore src/helpers
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:compile: npm run compile && npm run build
scripts.prepublish: npm run check:src && npm run build

author: Matteo Basso (https://github.com/mbasso)
